data.title: Performance Hall is excellent
data.text: I heard Tommy Emmanuel play here, and the acoustics were terrific. The setting is excellent, and they even have enough bathrooms for women at intermission!  All was very well done.

data.title: Excellent Facility
data.text: It has been years but I recently revisited this play/concert house. It is very nice, had great seating at a good price and the shows are entertaining. You can now buy drinks and take them into the theater with you. We will definitely go back.

data.title: Your one stop culture shop
data.text: Love this place. Have seen dozens of plays, art shows, concerts, and even had my wedding reception here! Great acoustics throughout each venue. Very intimate and great sight lines for plays. Ample parking and beautifully designed building and grounds in the heart of fort Collins.A real gem for Colorado.

data.title: lovely venue and arts center
data.text: really nicely designed and lovely arts center great music on offer, would recommend and how much more can I say

data.title: The Lincoln Center
data.text: Lots of different venues at the Lincoln Center!!   The have a lot of performing Art and Plays of every description!   Have had famous people appear and shows for kids as well as adults!  They even have a travel series.   At Christmastime there is a huge display of Christmas trees that all decorated differently.   The prices have gone up a lot over the years so can't always go as often as we would like but fun to go when something we really like is going on!

data.title: Nice Venue….
data.text: I was here for "Little Women" performed by students.  Good play.  No refreshments are sold.  We were in a smaller theater so seating was very good.

data.title: Remodeled, Revamped and Up to Date
data.text: Formerly the Lincoln Junior High many years ago, the Lincoln Center hosts meetings, festivals, art exhibits, plays, and music. It is an intimate setting and with great sound it is unbeatable.

data.title: comedy show
data.text: the place is a very nice location. service staff is very polite and helpful. the food was catered in so that all depends. the sound system works well and seats are comfortable

data.title: Don't Miss the Gallery
data.text: While many think of Lincoln Center as a performing arts venue, it also has a nice small gallery space that hosts rotating exhibits. We recently stopped by for the fiber art exhibit by the Weaver's Guild and enjoyed it immensely. Some top-notch weaving, felting, art quilting, spinning, etc.

data.title: nice venue for our town
data.text: this is a good place to enjoy some culture....there are a couple of theaters, smaller, for the local theater groups and the larger theater to bring in the bigger names.  Really no bad seat in any of them, the acoustics are great and the variety they strive to provide is really great for our town.  I look forward to seeing who they will bring in each year.

data.title: Beautiful Facility in Downtown Fort Collins
data.text: In December, we went to see a improv comedy show that was the funniest show I've ever seen in my life. It was engaging and entertaining. The facility was decorated for Christmas and it was beautiful. I hope to return again soon!

data.title: Recently renovated & beautiful space
data.text: A friend of mine was in a play recently, so I made my first official visit to the Lincoln Center to see him perform. Staff was courteous, friendly, and eager to help out. The facility was clean and had some neat pieces of artwork. They have a gallery with rotating exhibits, so I imagine a whole different set of artwork would be there the next time I visit. I did not partake in any drinks, but other audience members were enjoying beverages (both alcoholic and non-) throughout the show. The play itself was mediocre, but I was definitely impressed with the facility. They have many big acts come through, so I will definitely be visiting again in the future.

data.title: Maravilloso
data.text: Hermosos teatros que no se pueden peder !! Maravillosa la arquitectura. Tomen el tour y verán o escucharan algún ensayo de ballet, filarmónica u opera.
